name: Horse the Band
description: '''Horse the Band''' (stylized as '''HORSE the band''') is an American [[metalcore]] band from [[Lake Forest, California]], who are best known for their [[chiptune|8-bit]] video game-influenced sound combined with metalcore. Frontman Nathan Winneke once jokingly described their sound as "[[Nintendocore]]", although the band have gone to lengths to distance themselves from the label, reiterating that this merely describes the sound, not the substance.
